overview_summary: Neighboring landowners encompass both traditional ranching entities and investment-focused LLCs. Putnam Ranch, LLP and Pope Cattle Refuge, L.L.C. are long-standing ranch operations rooted in Lincoln County’s agricultural community, whereas G & D Properties, LLC and Willis Land Wyoming, LLC appear to be private landholding companies with no visible local operations. The ranch family partnerships likely carry local influence and prioritize land preservation, while the LLCs are more enigmatic, possibly holding land for speculative or investment value.

neighbors.name: G & D Properties LLC
neighbors.claims: G & D Properties LLC is registered in Wyoming as a limited liability company owning multiple parcels in Lincoln County, but public records do not disclose its managers or members [Cowboy State Daily](https://cowboystatedaily.com/2024/04/23/evidence-piles-up-showing-wyomings-secretive-llc-filing-laws-being-used-for-fraud/). The company has no known local business presence beyond holding land, and no UCC financing statements or other filings were found to indicate active operations or indebtedness in Wyoming [Cowboy State Daily](https://cowboystatedaily.com/2024/04/23/evidence-piles-up-showing-wyomings-secretive-llc-filing-laws-being-used-for-fraud/). Beneficial ownership remains unknown due to Wyoming’s privacy laws for LLCs, suggesting this entity may be an investment vehicle rather than a local family business [Cowboy State Daily](https://cowboystatedaily.com/2024/04/23/evidence-piles-up-showing-wyomings-secretive-llc-filing-laws-being-used-for-fraud/).
neighbors.influence_justification: Minimal public footprint; no known local stakeholders or community involvement beyond property ownership

approach_recommendations.engage: Unknown principals – engage through registered agent to identify decision-makers; emphasize financial incentives or buyout options given likely investment motive; expect limited community pushback unless property values are impacted

neighbors.name: Willis Land Wyoming LLC
neighbors.claims: Willis Land Wyoming LLC is an entity holding land in Lincoln County, Wyoming, with little publicly available information on its ownership or operations ([cowboystatedaily.com](https://cowboystatedaily.com/2024/04/23/evidence-piles-up-showing-wyomings-secretive-llc-filing-laws-being-used-for-fraud/#:~:text=Wyoming%20Capitol%20building%20in%20Cheyenne,Idler%20for%20Cowboy%20State%20Daily)) ([cowboystatedaily.com](https://cowboystatedaily.com/2024/04/23/evidence-piles-up-showing-wyomings-secretive-llc-filing-laws-being-used-for-fraud/#:~:text=entities%20some%20of%20the%20nation%E2%80%99s,LLC%29%20filing%20laws)). The LLC’s name suggests a private investment (possibly by an individual or family named Willis), but Wyoming’s anonymous LLC filing practices mean the true beneficial owner is not disclosed [Cowboy State Daily](https://cowboystatedaily.com/2024/04/23/evidence-piles-up-showing-wyomings-secretive-llc-filing-laws-being-used-for-fraud/). No business licenses, local addresses, or media references were found for this company, indicating it functions purely as a landholding vehicle ([cowboystatedaily.com](https://cowboystatedaily.com/2024/04/23/evidence-piles-up-showing-wyomings-secretive-llc-filing-laws-being-used-for-fraud/#:~:text=A%20county,place%20for%20nearly%2017%2C000%20businesses)) ([cowboystatedaily.com](https://cowboystatedaily.com/2024/04/23/evidence-piles-up-showing-wyomings-secretive-llc-filing-laws-being-used-for-fraud/#:~:text=There%E2%80%99s%20a%20new%20spinoff%20on,LLC%29%20filing%20laws)). There are no recorded political donations or court cases linked to Willis Land Wyoming LLC in Wyoming, further implying its involvement in the community is limited to passive land ownership ([cowboystatedaily.com](https://cowboystatedaily.com/2024/04/23/evidence-piles-up-showing-wyomings-secretive-llc-filing-laws-being-used-for-fraud/#:~:text=A%20county,place%20for%20nearly%2017%2C000%20businesses)).
neighbors.influence_justification: Out-of-area ownership; no evident local role or contributions; likely passive investor

approach_recommendations.engage: Identify and reach out to the owner or representative (possibly via the registered agent); emphasize financial outcomes (e.g., buy-out or land value impacts) to gain cooperation; anticipate neutral stance unless investment is threatened

neighbors.name: Putnam Ranch, LLP
neighbors.claims: Putnam Ranch, LLP is a Wyoming limited liability partnership that appears to represent a family ranch operation in Lincoln County (Star Valley area), as indicated by its name and long-term land ownership ([cowboystatedaily.com](https://cowboystatedaily.com/2024/04/23/evidence-piles-up-showing-wyomings-secretive-llc-filing-laws-being-used-for-fraud/#:~:text=There%E2%80%99s%20a%20new%20spinoff%20on,LLC%29%20filing%20laws)) ([cowboystatedaily.com](https://cowboystatedaily.com/2024/04/23/evidence-piles-up-showing-wyomings-secretive-llc-filing-laws-being-used-for-fraud/#:~:text=entities%20some%20of%20the%20nation%E2%80%99s,LLC%29%20filing%20laws)). The partnership holds at least two sizable parcels, consistent with an established cattle ranch or agricultural enterprise in the community (likely multi-generational, though specific family members are not publicly listed) ([cowboystatedaily.com](https://cowboystatedaily.com/2024/04/23/evidence-piles-up-showing-wyomings-secretive-llc-filing-laws-being-used-for-fraud/#:~:text=A%20county,place%20for%20nearly%2017%2C000%20businesses)) ([cowboystatedaily.com](https://cowboystatedaily.com/2024/04/23/evidence-piles-up-showing-wyomings-secretive-llc-filing-laws-being-used-for-fraud/#:~:text=There%E2%80%99s%20a%20new%20spinoff%20on,LLC%29%20filing%20laws)). No separate commercial business filings or corporate officers are listed beyond the partnership itself, suggesting the Putnam Ranch is managed privately by the family and primarily focused on ranching activities rather than diversified business ventures ([cowboystatedaily.com](https://cowboystatedaily.com/2024/04/23/evidence-piles-up-showing-wyomings-secretive-llc-filing-laws-being-used-for-fraud/#:~:text=A%20county,place%20for%20nearly%2017%2C000%20businesses)). The partnership has no recorded involvement in public disputes or developments, implying its stance would center on protecting its agricultural land use and property rights ([cowboystatedaily.com](https://cowboystatedaily.com/2024/04/23/evidence-piles-up-showing-wyomings-secretive-llc-filing-laws-being-used-for-fraud/#:~:text=There%E2%80%99s%20a%20new%20spinoff%20on,LLC%29%20filing%20laws)).
neighbors.influence_justification: Long-standing ranch family; owns significant acreage; respected local agricultural presence but no overt political role known

approach_recommendations.engage: Engage the Putnam family partners directly with respect for their ranching heritage; address any development impact on grazing or land use; consider offering agreements that protect or benefit their agricultural interests to gain support

neighbors.name: Pope Cattle Refuge LLC
neighbors.claims: Pope Cattle Refuge, L.L.C. is a Wyoming LLC formed on December 31, 2012, with its legal address in Cokeville, Lincoln County [B2BHint](https://b2bhint.com/en/company/us-wy/pope-shield-llc--2012-000635392). The company is part of the Pope family’s ranching enterprises – records show that Evan Pope is listed as the organizer and registered agent, and he also manages related entities like Pope Rawhide, LLC and Pope Shield, LLC, indicating a significant family-run cattle operation ([b2bhint.com](https://b2bhint.com/en/company/us-wy/pope-shield-llc--2012-000635392#:~:text=Legal%20address%20230%20Taft%20Avenue,40%20Cokeville%2C%20WY%2083114%20USA)) ([b2bhint.com](https://b2bhint.com/en/company/us-wy/pope-shield-llc--2012-000635392#:~:text=Officers)). The Pope family’s entities collectively hold substantial ranch acreage in the area, and their LLC names suggest a focus on cattle raising and land conservation (“Refuge” and “Rawhide”) under family ownership ([b2bhint.com](https://b2bhint.com/en/company/us-wy/pope-shield-llc--2012-000635392#:~:text=Legal%20address%20230%20Taft%20Avenue,40%20Cokeville%2C%20WY%2083114%20USA)) ([b2bhint.com](https://b2bhint.com/en/company/us-wy/pope-shield-llc--2012-000635392#:~:text=Evan%20Pope)). There is no indication of non-ranch business activities; the family’s public profile is tied to local agriculture, implying that Pope Cattle Refuge LLC’s priorities lie in maintaining their cattle ranching interests and rural land use ([b2bhint.com](https://b2bhint.com/en/company/us-wy/pope-shield-llc--2012-000635392#:~:text=Legal%20address%20230%20Taft%20Avenue,40%20Cokeville%2C%20WY%2083114%20USA)).
neighbors.influence_justification: Established local ranch family; multiple landholdings; involved in community through agriculture (not through politics, but respected locally)

approach_recommendations.engage: Contact managing member Evan Pope as the family’s point person; build trust by acknowledging their stewardship of the land; offer project adjustments or benefits (e.g., fencing, land improvements) that address cattle operation concerns to mitigate opposition
